config.autoRefreshIntervalMinutes.descri: Set the automatic refresh interval in minutes (1-15).
config.autoDeleteDays.description: Delete data older than the specified number of days (0 disables deletion).
config.ecoMeterThreshold.description: Set the Eco meter redzone threshold in dollars (0.1â€“3.0).
config.dailyUsageGoal.description: Set the daily usage goal in dollars (0 means no limit).
config.monthlyBudgetGoal.description: Set the monthly budget goal in dollars (0 means no limit).
config.pageSize.description: Set the number of rows shown per page.
